<target_code>
Here is the code of MHD_uint8_to_str_pad:
```c
size_t
MHD_uint8_to_str_pad (uint8_t val,
                      uint8_t min_digits,
                      char *buf,
                      size_t buf_size)
{
  size_t pos; /**< the position of the current printed digit */
  int digit;
  mhd_assert (3 >= min_digits);
  if (0 == buf_size)
    return 0;

  pos = 0;
  digit = val / 100;
  if (0 == digit)
  {
    if (3 <= min_digits)
      buf[pos++] = '0';
  }
  else
  {
    buf[pos++] = (char) ('0' + (char) digit);
    val %= 100;
    min_digits = 2;
  }

  if (buf_size <= pos)
    return 0;
  digit = val / 10;
  if (0 == digit)
  {
    if (2 <= min_digits)
      buf[pos++] = '0';
  }
  else
  {
    buf[pos++] = (char) ('0' + (char) digit);
    val %= 10;
  }

  if (buf_size <= pos)
    return 0;
  buf[pos++] = (char) ('0' + (char) val);
  return pos;
}
```
</target_code>
